item.title: Retro Drum Pack
item.dc:creator: JacobJustus
item.description:
I just thought it really fit with the retro dance style it doesn’t all have to be retro. Just my way of mixing the old with the new. BTW that drum pack you made sounds awesome!

item.title: Retro Drum Pack
item.dc:creator: Peregrihn
item.description:
What exactly makes this set of drums retro? Just because you slap it onto a nice synth melody doesn’t make it that… the sounds are nice and all but I don’t think they fall under the classification you’re trying to put them in. Here, let me show you what a retro drum pack should sound like (all external samples will be free for use)

Read full topic
